  <script>var supportsAllFeatures =
    window.Promise &&
    window.Promise.prototype.finally &&
    window.fetch &&
    window.Symbol &&
    window.CustomEvent &&
    Array.prototype.includes &&
    Element.prototype.remove &&
    Element.prototype.closest &&
    Element.prototype.attachShadow &&
    window.NodeList &&
    NodeList.prototype.forEach
;

if (!supportsAllFeatures) {
    false && console.log("Older browser detected. Initiating polyfills.");
    var head = document.getElementsByTagName('head')[0];
    var script = document.createElement('script');
    script.src = "https://community.gofundme.com/dist/polyfills.min.js?h=60b69686";

        script.async = false;
    // document.write has to be used instead of append child for edge & old safari compatibility.
    document.write(script.outerHTML);
} else {
    false && console.log("Modern browser detected. No polyfills necessary");
}

if (!window.onVanillaReady) {
    window.onVanillaReady = function (handler) {
        if (typeof handler !== "function") {
            console.error("Cannot register a vanilla ready handler that is not a function.");
            return;
        }
        document.addEventListener("X-DOMContentReady", function () {
            if (!window.__VANILLA_INTERNAL_IS_READY__) {
                return;
            }
            handler(window.__VANILLA_GLOBALS_DO_NOT_USE_DIRECTLY__);
        })

        if (window.__VANILLA_INTERNAL_IS_READY__) {
            handler(window.__VANILLA_GLOBALS_DO_NOT_USE_DIRECTLY__);
        }
    }
}</script>

  <noscript>
   <style>body {visibility: visible !important;}</style>
  </noscript> 
  <script>
function modifyConnectMessaging() {
   let passwordField = document.querySelectorAll("#ConnectPassword");
   
   if (passwordField.length > 0) {
     passwordField.item(0).style.display = "none";
   }
   let items = document.querySelectorAll(".Messages.Errors ul li");
   let errMessages = items.length;
   let invalidErrMessages = 0;
   items.forEach(function(item) {
     let content = item.innerHTML;
     if (content.includes('You must agree to the')) {
       item.style.display = "none";
       invalidErrMessages += 1;
     }
     if (content.includes('Password is required')) {
       item.style.display = "none";
       invalidErrMessages += 1;
     }
   });
  
   if (invalidErrMessages == errMessages) {
     document.querySelectorAll(".Messages.Errors").forEach(function(errMess) {
       errMess.style.display = "none";
     });
   }
   let lists = document.querySelectorAll("ul li").forEach(function(list) {
     if (list.innerHTML.includes('choose a different username')) {
     		list.querySelectorAll("div").forEach(function(divs) {
          divs.style.display = "none";
        });	
     }
   });

    // let connectForm = document.querySelectorAll("form").forEach(function(forms) {
   	// if (forms.getAttribute("action") == "/entry/connect/saml?authKey=gfmcommunity") {
    //   forms.addEventListener('submit', function() {
    //   console.log("Form was submited");
    //   });
    // }
    // });
}

if (window.location.pathname.includes('entry/connect/')) {
window.addEventListener('load', function() {
   modifyConnectMessaging();
});
(function() {
    const send = XMLHttpRequest.prototype.send
    XMLHttpRequest.prototype.send = function() { 
        this.addEventListener('load', function() {
             modifyConnectMessaging();
        })
        return send.apply(this, arguments)
    }
})()
}
</script> 
  <noscript> 
   <style>
                .fullPageLoader { display: none }

                body.isLoading .page {
                    max-height: initial;
                    height: initial;
                }
            </style> 
  </noscript> 
 </head> 
 <body class="Dashboard Profile isDesktop comments  Profile Section-Profile isLoading dataDriven"> 
  <div id="page" class="page">
   <noscript id="themeHeader"> 
    <style>/*
 * These styles apply ONLY to the header and footer assets.
 */


* {
    padding: 0;
    margin: 0;
    box-sizing: border-box;
}

.footer {
    color: #333333;
    font-size: 14px;
    line-height: 1.5;
    padding: 40px 0 18px;
}

.footer * {
    font-family: "Lato", sans-serif;
}

.footer-wrap {
    padding-left: 18px;
    padding-right: 18px;
    max-width: 1236px;
    margin: 0 auto;
}

.footer li {
    list-style: none;
}

.footer a {
    text-decoration: none;
}
.footer a:hover {
    color: #0276b3;
}

.footer-row {
    display: block;
}

.footer-row.bottom {
    padding-top: 60px;
    font-weight: 100;
    margin-top: 24px;
    border-top: 1px solid #e4e4e4;
}

.footer-row.top .footer-col {
}

.footer-col {
    padding: 0 3px;
}

.footer-col-copyRight {
    justify-content: flex-start;
}

.footer-col-logo {
    width: 25%;
}

.footer-list:last-child {
    padding-bottom: 20px;
}

.footer-listTitle {
    color: #02a95c;
    display: inline-block;
    text-transform: uppercase;
    font-size: 13px;
    font-weight: 900;
    letter-spacing: -0.1px;
    padding-bottom: 20px;
}

.footer-link {
    list-style: none;
    padding-bottom: 8px;
}

.footer-list.legal .footer-link:not(.copyright) {
    padding-bottom: 0;
}

.footer-link:last-child {
    padding-bottom: 20;
}

.footer-link a,
.footer-link span {
    font-size: 16px;
    font-style: normal;
    font-weight: 400;
    line-height: 24px;
    letter-spacing: 0px;
    text-align: left;
    color: #333333;
}

.footer-link:not(.copyright) a:hover,
.footer-link:not(.copyright) span:hover {
    color: #02a95c;
    text-decoration: underline;
}

.logo {
    display: block;
    height: 3rem;
    margin-bottom: 1rem;
    width: 7rem;
}

.social-links-list {
    margin-bottom: 16px;
}

.social-links-list .social-item {
    display: inline-block;
    margin-right: 16px;
}

@media screen and (min-width: 768px) {
    .footer-row {
        display: flex;
        flex-wrap: wrap;
        justify-content: space-between;
        margin: -3px;
    }

    .footer-col:first-child {
        margin-top: 0;
    }

    .footer-col:last-child {
        margin-bottom: 0;
    }

    .footer-col-copyRight,
    .footer-col-logo {
        justify-content: center;
    }

    .footer-row.bottom {
        flex-direction: row-reverse;
        align-items: center;
    }
    .footer-list.legal .footer-link {
        display: inline-block;
        margin-right: 16px;
    }

    .footer-row.bottom .social-links-list {
        margin-bottom: 0;
    }
}

</style>

           <section class="Content MainContent"> 
            <style>
    #Form_Location.InputBox {
        display: none! important
    }

                   <p>Hi. When I posted on social media, I found the most luck using twitter and facebook. You can also send out an email to your family and close friends to help get your story out there by asking them to share your campaign. Good luck.</p>

                <li id="Comment_53" class="Item"> 
                 <div class="ItemContent"> 
                  <div class="Message"> 
                   <p>Hello! What I have found really helps increase both the quantity and amount of donations is to offer a gift at different levels of giving. For my campaign, I offered copies of my books (at my own expense) at different amounts: $100, $250, and $50… </p>
                  </div> 
                  <div class="Meta"> <span class="MItem">in <b><a href="https://community.gofundme.com/discussion/comment/53#Comment_53" rel="nofollow">What’s the most creative way to fundraise that you've seen in your community?</a></b></span> <span class="MItem">Comment by <a href="/profile/RonH" class="js-userCard" data-userid="98">RonH</a></span> <span class="MItem"><a href="https://community.gofundme.com/discussion/comment/53#Comment_53">April 8</a></span>

                  <div class="Meta"> <span class="MItem">in <b><a href="https://community.gofundme.com/discussion/comment/50#Comment_50" rel="nofollow">What are some of the best ways to get donations if you don't know that many people?</a></b></span> <span class="MItem">Comment by <a href="/profile/RonH" class="js-userCard" data-userid="98">RonH</a></span> <span class="MItem"><a href="https://community.gofundme.com/discussion/comment/50#Comment_50">April 7</a></span> 
                  </div> 
                 </div> </li> 
                <li id="Comment_46" class="Item"> 
                 <div class="ItemContent"> 
                  <div class="Message"> 
                   <p>Hi Everyone! </p>
                   <p>My name is Ron. I Iive in San Francisco and am so honored to be a part of this GFM community. I've used the GFM platform twice (Spring 2018 and Winter 2019) for successful fundraising campaigns thanks to the wonderful support … </p>
                  </div> 
                  <div class="Meta"> <span class="MItem">in <b><a href="https://community.gofundme.com/discussion/comment/46#Comment_46" rel="nofollow">Introduce yourself here!</a></b></span> <span class="MItem">Comment by <a href="/profile/RonH" class="js-userCard" data-userid="98">RonH</a></span> <span class="MItem"><a href="https://community.gofundme.com/discussion/comment/46#Comment_46">April 7</a></span> 
                  </div> 
                 </div> </li> 
                <div id="PagerMore" class="MorePager Foot">
                 <a href="/profile/comments/RonH?page=p2" rel="nofollow">More Comments</a>
                </div>
               </ul>
              </div>
             </section>
            </div> 
           </section> 
           <div class="Panel Panel-main">
